sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import styles from './CurrentDay.css'; const CurrentDay = ({ forecast }) => { var today = new Date(); var dd = String(today.getDate()).padStart(2, '0'); var mm = String(today.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); var yyyy = today.getFullYear(); today = mm + '/' + dd + '/' + yyyy; return(

{forecast.city}

{today}

Temperature

Temp:{forecast.temp}째C

Temp_min:{forecast.temp_min}째C

Temp_max:{forecast.temp_max}째C

Feels_Like:{forecast.feels_like}째C

{/*

{date}

*/}

Weather

Sunrise:{forecast.sunrise}

Sunset:{forecast.sunset}

) }; export default CurrentDay;
